channel.title: Project Guardian Development [Updated Again 10/29]
channel.description:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2en2lio.png[/img] [b]Project Guardian Development[/b]
[b]Information:[/b] I will be keeping this thread up to date with everything i work on. And we still do need more developers so if your interested please look at the Development Team Thread.
[b]Website[/b] Undecided Yet.
[b]Server Base[/b] Project Insanity
[b]Development Team Thread:[/b] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460748.msg3370800.html#msg3370800
[b]Skills[/b] [size=8pt]Thanks Valentino For The Icons[/size]
[img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Attack.png[/img]90% Need to work on some of the weapon specials, and then it will be complete. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Strength.png[/img] 100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Defence.png[/img]100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Range.png[/img]100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Hitpoints.png[/img] 90% Need to work on poison timers. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Prayer.png[/img] 100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Magic.png[/img]100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Cooking.png[/img]60% Need to add correct cooking timers. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Fishing.png[/img]50% Need to making fishing actually fish. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Crafting.png[/img]Have Not Tested [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Theiving.png[/img]85% Working on adding more stalls. 100% working thieving timers. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Herblore.png[/img]Have Not Tested [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Firemaking.png[/img]50% Need to Fix Nocliping Bug [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Fletchingcopy.png[/img]60% Needs, Fletching Emotes [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Woodcutting.png[/img]100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Runescarfting.png[/img]? Have Not Tested. [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Slayer.png[/img]100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Smithing.png[/img]Tested Some Not 100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Mining.png[/img]100%
[b]Towns[/b]
[b]Falador:[/b] [b]85%[/b] I have added the correct npc's in their spots, now i need to add the shops. [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/6yd191.jpg[/img]
[b]Lumbridge:[/b] [b]50% Lumbridge has some features done. I have added the working doors, so far we need to make the castle middle floor, and top floors work. I also need to add the goblins behind the castle. [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/4jl02g.jpg[/img]
[b]Varrock:[/b] [b]60% For Varrock i need to add shops, and possibly work on varrock castle. The varrock Multi PVP area works. Sorry No Pictures At This Time
[b]Edgeville:[/b] [b]80%[/b] Edgeville is the main spawn point for the server. You can find common shops for weapons and pvp gear. Now i am planning on adding portals to other places around there. [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/xpzv2x.jpg[/img]
[b]Barbarian Village[/b] [b]100%[/b] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2dv3ma0.jpg[/img]
[b]Dranor Village[/b] [b]80%[/b] Need to get some off the willows to cut. Diango shop wont let you buy items. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2m5nkb4.jpg[/img]
[b]---------Other Towns Not Listed---------[/b] Catherby - 75% - Need to make fishing spots work. Camelot - 60% - Most trees are cuttable, smithing area works, now i only need to work on the range guild.
Prayer System [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/11h45fk.gif[/img]
Skillcapes [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ykfe5g.gif[/img]
New Farming: [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2wlveyu.gif[/img]
100% Working Herblore - 10/29 [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/newd2d.gif[/img]
Added Humidify [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/24p9zsx.gif[/img]
Okay with [PI] there is alot of bugs, but i have been working on them like crazy, i even fixed some i never even knew about here is the the bug fix log. [code] Project Guardian Bug Fix Log 10/23 - Fixed Clan Chat Bug - When a player would type the client would crash sometimes. 10/23 - Fixed Item Slot Bug - When a player would equipt a skillcape hood/ other item it would go into the incorrect slot. 10/23 - Fixed Adding/Delete Friend Bug - When a player would add a friend sometimes his client would crash. 10/23 - Fixed Price Display Bug - When a player trades the general store to sell a item, the price might be display incorrectly. 10/23 - Fixed Dueling - When a player stakes a item, and wins it didnt show it in the the spoils. 10/23 - Fixed Item Duping - A player could duplicate a item multiple ways. Fixed almost every dupe bug that i know of. 10/23 - Fixed Granite Maul Special - A player would spec somebody and he would have to reclick to start attacking. 10/23 - Added Roleback Support - If the server crashed, it would immediately backup the players character file. [/code]
[b]Minigames[/b]
[b]Pest Control 90%[/b] Pest Control is works, but the only bug that needs to be changed is the interfaces. I am currently working on making it like this. [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m601g6.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/r0qgqc.png[/img]
[b]Fight Pits 100%[/b] Sorry No Pictures At This Time
[b]Assault 0%[/b] I am currently working on the assault minigame. Now im hoping i can get this finished in the next week or so. Now im looking for some people to help me on this one. Please contact me via msn or the development team thread.
[b]Warriors Guild 60%[/b] I am currently working on the warriors guild, now i have all the files to do this, but i haven't got to it. The warriors guild will have all the shops & games.
[b]-----------------CLIENT SIDE-----------------------------------------[/b] Okay i need some help with the client, but here is what i have got completed in the client.
----COMPLETED------ Godwars Map Cache
Warriors Guild Map Cache
GodWars Bosses
Skillcape Emotes -----------------------
-----To Do List-------- Add 474 Emote For Short/Long Bow
Add Custom PVP Interfaces [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/ftmwzk.png[/img] ---------------------------------------------------- [b]Some Snippets Ive Added To The Server[/b] [code] Project Guardian Snippets 10/27 - New Hp Bar 10/27 - New NPC Drops Setup 10/24 - Added Godsword Dismantling and Mantling 10/24 - Change Death Emote To Default Runescape 10/24 - Changed Requirement For 4 items to PK [/code]
If you support Project Guardian please put this shitty 3 minute support image i made in your topic lol [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/250uhpx.png[/img]

item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:


Project Guardian Development

Information: I will be keeping this thread up to date with everything i work on. And we still do need more developers so if your interested please look at the Development Team Thread.

Website Undecided Yet.

Server Base Project Insanity

Development Team Thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460748.msg3370800.html#msg3370800

Skills
[size=8pt]Thanks Valentino For The Icons[/size]

90% Need to work on some of the weapon specials, and then it will be complete.
100%
100%
100%
90% Need to work on poison timers.
100%
100%
60% Need to add correct cooking timers.
50% Need to making fishing actually fish.
Have Not Tested
85% Working on adding more stalls. 100% working thieving timers.
Have Not Tested
50% Need to Fix Nocliping Bug
60% Needs, Fletching Emotes
100%
? Have Not Tested.
100%
Tested Some Not 100%
100%

Towns

Falador: 85% I have added the correct npc’s in their spots, now i need to add the shops.

6yd191.jpg766×501

Lumbridge: [b]50% Lumbridge has some features done. I have added the working doors, so far we need to make the castle middle floor, and top floors work. I also need to add the goblins behind the castle.

Varrock: [b]60% For Varrock i need to add shops, and possibly work on varrock castle. The varrock Multi PVP area works.
Sorry No Pictures At This Time

Edgeville: 80% Edgeville is the main spawn point for the server. You can find common shops for weapons and pvp gear. Now i am planning on adding portals to other places around there.

xpzv2x.jpg766×508

Barbarian Village 100%

Dranor Village 80%
Need to get some off the willows to cut. Diango shop wont let you buy items.

2m5nkb4.jpg765×505

---------Other Towns Not Listed---------
Catherby - 75% - Need to make fishing spots work.
Camelot - 60% - Most trees are cuttable, smithing area works, now i only need to work on the range guild.

Prayer System

11h45fk.gif759×502

Skillcapes

New Farming:

100% Working Herblore - 10/29

Added Humidify

Okay with [PI] there is alot of bugs, but i have been working on them like crazy, i even fixed some i never even knew about here is the the bug fix log.

Project Guardian Bug Fix Log
10/23 - Fixed Clan Chat Bug - When a player would type the client would crash sometimes.
10/23 - Fixed Item Slot Bug - When a player would equipt a skillcape hood/ other item it would go into the incorrect slot.
10/23 - Fixed Adding/Delete Friend Bug - When a player would add a friend sometimes his client would crash.
10/23 - Fixed Price Display Bug - When a player trades the general store to sell a item, the price might be display incorrectly.
10/23 - Fixed Dueling - When a player stakes a item, and wins it didnt show it in the the spoils.
10/23 - Fixed Item Duping - A player could duplicate a item multiple ways. Fixed almost every dupe bug that i know of.
10/23 - Fixed Granite Maul Special - A player would spec somebody and he would have to reclick to start attacking.
10/23 - Added Roleback Support - If the server crashed, it would immediately backup the players character file.

Minigames

Pest Control 90%
Pest Control is works, but the only bug that needs to be changed is the interfaces. I am currently working on making it like this.

Fight Pits 100%
Sorry No Pictures At This Time

Assault 0%
I am currently working on the assault minigame. Now im hoping i can get this finished in the next week or so. Now im looking for some people to help me on this one. Please contact me via msn or the development team thread.

Warriors Guild 60%
I am currently working on the warriors guild, now i have all the files to do this, but i haven’t got to it. The warriors guild will have all the shops & games.

-----------------CLIENT SIDE-----------------------------------------
Okay i need some help with the client, but here is what i have got completed in the client.

----COMPLETED------
Godwars Map Cache

Warriors Guild Map Cache

GodWars Bosses

Skillcape Emotes

-----To Do List--------
Add 474 Emote For Short/Long Bow

Add Custom PVP Interfaces

Some Snippets Ive Added To The Server

Project Guardian Snippets
10/27 - New Hp Bar
10/27 - New NPC Drops Setup
10/24 - Added Godsword Dismantling and Mantling
10/24 - Change Death Emote To Default Runescape
10/24 - Changed Requirement For 4 items to PK

If you support Project Guardian please put this shitty 3 minute support image i made in your topic lol

Read full topic
